text:
For some reason, on Windows 2003 Server, the ROOT directory is returned as Root
in findADSIObject.  Consequently, the install script doesn't find it and fails.

To fix it, modify line 483 on install4iis.js.  Change "ROOT" to "Root".
creator: cupetc@btinternet.com

text:
I'm concerned this change would break behavior on other, non Windows 2003
Server, systems.  Maybe a better approach is to look for ROOT (all caps), and if
not found, then look for Root (initial cap R only)?
creator: yoavs@computer.org
CyberSongs@Musics.net
text:
Microsoft needs to catch up with the rest of the world and make their directory 
structures case sensitive and that is the only solution to their case 
insensitivity problem.

creator: markt@apache.org
